installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install unzip wget ca-certificates

## Mount Pterodactyl Docker Container
if [ ! -d /mnt/server/ ]; then
    mkdir /mnt/server/
fi

## Go to server directory
cd /mnt/server

## Backup Config Files
rm *.bak
cp ./T6_Server/Server/Multiplayer/main/dedicated.cfg dedicated.cfg.bak
cp ./T6_Server/Server/Zombie/main/dedicated_zm.cfg dedicated_zm.cfg.bak

##Download Latest Server File Version
echo "Downloading latest version of plutonium please wait..."
wget https://vault.our-space.xyz/ATOM/T6_Server.zip -q --show-progress

## Extract Server
unzip -o T6_Server.zip
rm T6_Server.zip

## Restore Config Files
cp -rf dedicated.cfg.bak ./T6_Server/Server/Multiplayer/main/dedicated.cfg
cp -rf dedicated_zm.cfg.bak ./T6_Server/Server/Multiplayer/main/dedicated_zm.cfg

chmod -R 777 ./*
## Make User Aware of the Setup Origin
echo "# Unofficial Pterodactyl-Plutonium Server \nThe help is not yet written please refer to atom@our-space.xyz or [<@478668961626587157>](paste this in discord chat) in discord" > README.md

echo "Server Succesfully Installed Enjoy!"
